title: CSL Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 260 Fabrication & Outfit Assistant Posts
description: The Cochin Shipyard Limited (CSL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 260Â Fabrication & Outfit Assistant Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th and ITI can apply for the CSL Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit selection process, application fee,...
